tool_plan.objective: Collect votes/timeline, market/TVL impacts, adjacent proposals; then decide.

calls.why: Full vote history for timeline features

tool_plan.notes: Agent can call forums.fetch_discussion and sentiment.classify_forum_comments if needed. See semantic_references for governance literature grounding

decision.summary: No votes were cast on this proposal, and there is no timeline or market impact data available to inform a decision. The choice is selected by default with low confidence.
key_arguments_for: No votes cast to indicate preference.
No timeline metrics or market impacts to inform decision.
Adjacent proposals do not provide relevant insights.
key_arguments_against: Lack of any voting data or participation reduces confidence.
No market or TVL impact data available.
No authoritative governance token address resolved.

evidence.quote: Timeline metrics empty; no participation data

decision.simulation_reason: No votes or market data available; decision by default.
decision.ai_final_conclusion: Selected 'Gustavo Grieco' by default due to no votes or data; stance neutral.
